app.routes module¶

app.routes.createEvent()¶

Create Event Page

Returns:Create events (title, description, date, start and end time) via a form
app.routes.createSchedule()¶

Edit/Create Schedule Function

Returns:Users will be allowed to edit/create their schedule here.
app.routes.deleteEvent(id)¶

Delete Event Function

Returns:Deletes the event with id of ‘id’
Parameters:id (int) – Id of the event you want to delete
app.routes.editEvent(id)¶

Edit Event Function

Returns:Edits and updates the event with id of ‘id’
Parameters:id (int) – Id of the event you want to edit
app.routes.friends()¶

Friends Page

Returns:Page for users to send friend requests
app.routes.getSchedule(user)¶

Get Schedule Function

Returns:Gets the schedule of the user that is passed in via function parameter
Parameters:user (string) – User to retrieve schedule
app.routes.index()¶

Main Home Page

Returns:Displays the user status and friends
app.routes.landingPage()¶
app.routes.login()¶

Login Page

Returns:Page for users to log into their account
app.routes.logout()¶

Logout

Returns:Function used to log out the current user
app.routes.register()¶

Register Page

Returns:Page for new users to register for an account
app.routes.updateFriendRequest()¶

Friend Request Function

Returns:Function to accept or decline an incoming friend request.
app.routes.updateSchedule()¶

Update Schedule Function

Returns:Uses AJAX calls to retrieve changed schedule data and updates the database
app.routes.updateStatus()¶

Update Status

Returns:Function used to update the current user’s status
app.routes.viewEvent()¶

View Event Page

Returns:View the current user’s events

Tests if the event deletion route works.

Tests if the friend request system’s request status works.

Tests if two users can add each other correctly.

Tests if a new user can be created.
